website_summaries.verdict: A high-quality set for intermediate and advanced bakers. Wilton is the biggest name in the industry, and this is the best decorator set.
pros: Set includes 55 stainless steel tips, two flower nails, two couplers, and a sturdy storage box
cons: Couplers do not accommodate largest piping tips
Some customer complaints about storage box latch

customer_reviews.title: I love this set
customer_reviews.text: I love this set!! Everything came in great shape and I got more XL tips than expected. I think they increased the amount of tips you get. I love the quality of these tips, I am excited to start using them.
customer_reviews.author: MaitreyeeMAYHEM

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: I recently got into making decorated sugar cookies so I didn’t want a set with spatulas and other cake decorating supplies. This set has inspired me to make more cookies, try different tips and make miniature flowers.
customer_reviews.author: Claudette

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners
customer_reviews.text: I recently wanted to start learning how to pipe buttercream flowers and looked for a basic set with the most flower piping tips. This set was priced really reasonable considering how many tips you get. There are tips for piping different kind of leaves, petals, regular round ones for cupcakes and swirls. Since I’m using this set to learn flower piping, only half the tips were useful for me. The flower holders included are pretty small so you can only pipe small flowers on it. Overall it was a good basic set.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Cake decorating
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves this set, huge variety, great price, she has many of the decorating tips and this set had the tips she didn't which I thought was pretty amazing considering how long she has been decorating cakes (as a hobby!). Anyway, they work well and she thinks the case is a great idea. I would buy them again for her or as a gift to someone who would enjoy them ( and maybe make me a cake!)
customer_reviews.author: A J

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces from listing. Not happy but needed others
customer_reviews.text: Missing tips from listing. I actually wanted the 2a and it is shown on the packaging and in the listing. I needed some of the other tips as well, so i used it and cant return
customer_reviews.author: Bronco628

customer_reviews.title: This is a great tip set if you're looking to start out your ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tip set if you're looking to start out your decorating career with some nice variety. There are enough in the set to create nice leaves, roses, waves, stars, and lettering. Unfortunately, the kit does not come with couplings to fit the larger tips, and I had to buy a couple so I could use them.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Every piece is in the package and in good condition! All the essentials for piping is included ...
customer_reviews.text: I checked all the piping tips. Every piece is in the package and in good condition! All the essentials for piping is included here.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great price! Great kit!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great purchase for me to get a kit to have all these tips for piping. Great price compared to hobby stores. The container itself is not the best. If the pieces aren’t perfectly lined up right then it won’t close. But it does have a lot of tips which I love having. They are easy to clean. I rinse them with warm water when I’m done using and then wash them when I wash the pans from baking.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Can't go wrong with WQilton's
customer_reviews.text: I bought several cake decorating items as my son is a chef and also caters private parties. He does all his cooking from scratch, but was purchasing his desserts from a bakery and wanted to start doing his own. I have always chosen Wilton's for any cake decorating equipment as it is the best made.
customer_reviews.author: Bunny

customer_reviews.title: Great service
customer_reviews.text: I am willing to give five stars after a fast& easy exchange. Originally it was shipped without a package and the box was damaged a bit. I received the new item the other day after I requested exchange. Very good service. The product has great quality, I love all the tips.
customer_reviews.author: Lane

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality handy box to keep tips and nails. Plenty of tips to play with.
customer_reviews.text: I hope the marking of tip# can be more visible on the shiny stainless steel tip. Also I wouldn't mind the box becomes bigger so bigger flower nails can be kept. The box helps to keep pieces well-organised and I love that it has spare stands to put extra tips. Plenty of variety tips to play with. However, the flower nails are too small and there is not enough space to put extra nails. I end up buying bigger flower nails and can't keep those in the same box. I love this item, still.
customer_reviews.author: Monchacha

customer_reviews.title: So many decorating tips!
customer_reviews.text: I am really pleased with this set. There are so many different tips included! I love trying them all out to learn different ways to decorate cakes and cupcakes. I cut off the piece of the box that shows that each tip does and I've kept that to reference. I also love the case it came with. Makes storage so easy!
customer_reviews.author: Heather CTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the investment
customer_reviews.text: I'm so happy I splurged and got the big pack of tips. I love that they come in a case - no more digging through a ziplock bag for the right tip. I also wanted the flower nails and extra plastic collar pieces. Overall very pleased. Definitely more than you need if you're just frosting a batch of cupcakes, but I'm loving being able to practice more complex decorations. It would be awesome if they made a storage case that also had room for reusable frosting bags so it's all in one place.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Don’t Do It__Only Unpopular Tips
customer_reviews.text: Awful tip set. Didn’t realize my return window had expired. Guess I will donate to Goodwill.
customer_reviews.author: Stephenie King

customer_reviews.title: Great product (and gift for a baker!)
customer_reviews.text: Love this so much! My friend and I are really into baking so for Galentine’s Day I got her this, because she didn’t have any piping tips. I did, but my collection was quite limited and I just had to get one for myself as well. The couplers work well, and the flower pins are great too. I wouldn’t even think twice about purchasing it. It’s great.
customer_reviews.author: kouboura

customer_reviews.title: So happy!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so happy with this set. Unlike other sellers this case is really nice and the tips are actually engraved with the numbers. It also has a picture guide of with what each number will produce. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Riddler

customer_reviews.title: Lotsa tips
customer_reviews.text: All the tips in one handy box. Who am I kidding, I don't use all these tips ever, since all I do is frost kid's birthday cupcakes for school and make deviled eggs, but the inner cake decorator artist in me really likes that they're there if I need them. Plus, I don't have to go hunting for "Where the heck did I put that" star tip. Because it's in the big purple box.
customer_reviews.author: Elise Chandler

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT!
customer_reviews.text: We bought these on the fly for decorating cakes and cupcakes for a Celebration of Life ceremony. We have never used anything like this before and we were able to somewhat master it in under an hour.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Decorating Set!
customer_reviews.text: These replaced an older set of Ateco brand tips I had, and I enjoy using these Wilton tips much more. I find them easier to clean and they are holding up to use without rusting, which attests to how high quality they are. I got these for my birthday in November and could not be more pleased with the assortment this set offers. Definitely worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: SomeGeekyGirlTop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: Just what i needed!
customer_reviews.text: Thinner metal than the old ones ibhave, but it was time to replace and this set has all my most used tips!
customer_reviews.author: Aneika

customer_reviews.title: Typical Wilton product
customer_reviews.text: Great quality case, all the tips are one-piece extruded tips (none of the “seams” you find on some cheap tips). There’s a great variety of tip sizes, but there are also a few spare spots for other tips you may collect along the way. Has several collars too.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Great product, probably not very durable and little room for expansion
customer_reviews.text: Great variety of tips and compact storage case. However, the case latchs hinge on plastic and will not last...have seen many such things fail in my 70 years. Also, only a few extra spaces for additional tips. But still quite cool.
customer_reviews.author: Forestperson

customer_reviews.title: Hard to open and close
customer_reviews.text: I love this case, it makes taking my tips back and forth to school so simple and I always know I have them all. However it's very hard to open and close without feeling like I'm going to break it. I don't know if the plastic of mine got warped somehow but it seems like the top and bottom barely fit together. It's held up so far but I use it pretty heavily so i'm scared the tabs that hold it together will break someday.
customer_reviews.author: Kasey

customer_reviews.title: Nice set
customer_reviews.text: Good set of piping tips. The only downside to this set is that it includes large tips but not a large tip coupler (only two small tip couplers). Not such a big deal since it's easy enough to purchase one, but it would be nice if the storage box had been designed to fit a large coupler in somewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: Great set! I loved that it came with a carrying case. Wish It came with couplers to fit the biggest tips. I can’t get my icing consistency/temp right but hopefully I’ll be able to use all of these!
customer_reviews.author: autumn

customer_reviews.title: All around great set!
customer_reviews.text: Really is a wonderful set for all your decorating needs especially buttercream flowers. A beginner would probably like to get a more instructional book or dvd. A great for all experience levels as there are various sizes for some same shapes which a wider choice in flower sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Christa

customer_reviews.title: My first introduction to this company is awful. I've already shared my experience with my family
customer_reviews.text: I'm was looking forward to using my new tools. I saw hair on the box it was pieces missing a lot of tools were missing. I'm really dissatisfied very disgusted and so disappointed in Wilton products!
customer_reviews.author: Dane

customer_reviews.title: exactly as expected
customer_reviews.text: Love this set. I was a bit apprehensive based on some of the unhappy reviews I read but needn't have been. My set was great. No duplicates. Obviously new. In perfect condition. I have numerous tips already and thought this was the best way to increase my stash. I am disappointed by the lack of a 1M tip. Luckily I have 2 already but consider this a big minus for anyone starting from scratch as it is one of the most frequently used tips.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these!!!! This set is so easy to use and the Wilton site and YouTube is so helpful in tying to find the perfect tip for what you want to make with the icing! Professional and perfect results every time!! I highly recommend this for any person who loves baking like I do!!
customer_reviews.author: cassie94

customer_reviews.title: No good for the cupcakes
customer_reviews.text: I opened my package and tips are bent and broken.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of  3

customer_reviews.title: Nice tips
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set of tips and perfect for someone starting out. I use these with every cake. Wilton tips are some of the best. There is an awesome chart included that shows what design each tip makes. That chart alone is worth the purchase. The only thing I do not like is the container. Wilton should not have changed from the other box. It took some work to get the top closed. While that's annoying its easily fixed by using a different container.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Nice assortment of tips.
customer_reviews.text: This set has a very nice assortment of tips. A little bit of everything to do just about anything you want.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn M.

customer_reviews.title: I love the tips and the case is nice
customer_reviews.text: I love the tips and the case is nice. The only complaint I have is that the handles on the side take a lot of force to open and lock and I'm worried after a few uses that they are going to break off. Otherwise, it arrived in perfect condition and I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Wilson2011

customer_reviews.title: Be carefull
customer_reviews.text: Huffff. Please don't buy guys its not what its on internet , they are tiny small . And made in china . Looks like used .
customer_reviews.author: Ricky

customer_reviews.title: Cheap case!!!
customer_reviews.text: The tips are great but the plastic case they come in is CHEAP and breaks easily!!!
customer_reviews.author: Golfguy

customer_reviews.title: A great gift for those young children interested in baking! They can do so much with this kit.
customer_reviews.text: Great gift idea! An 8 year old girl, who loves to bake, has been learning a lot of different things to make with these various tips. A good idea as a birthday or holiday gift.
customer_reviews.author: BigHeartsWithHelpingHandsOrg

customer_reviews.title: Poor Shipping
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Christmas gift and do not appreciate the large shipping labels stuck to the front of the box itself. After spending 45 mins of trying to peel them off I'm left with a sticky residue and a gift that now looks terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Charlene Fox

customer_reviews.title: Great Tips
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife since she loves baking cakes and decorating them , so far so good all the tips seems to work the way they’re supposed to with a unique decorating design in each tip. Definitely recommend this product !
customer_reviews.author: Luis Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Great assortment of tips
customer_reviews.text: This is my first set of decorating tips which I bought with Wilton bags (zip top bag would have worked just the same). This set has a nice assortment of tips, far more then I will ever use, but I'm a bit of a kitchen gadget collector.
customer_reviews.author: Brian K

customer_reviews.title: Love this set.
customer_reviews.text: Good price for all the piece you get with this set. Can't wait to use them.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Finally- no mess if container falls over!
customer_reviews.text: Thank you for finally having a container for tips that keeps them in place, even when it falls on its side! This is a really nicely designed container all in all, received it with all the tips still in their spots and nothing disorganized. Also love the locking lid
customer_reviews.author: Quincy J

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Nice with the chart easy to read, ship on time, Love the different size tips
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: This box is all you need for decorating anything! It has good quality. If you want to use it to pipe flowers.. have no worries it contain all that you need. You can even pipe basket using one of the tip. It will be better if it comes along with a brush to clean the tip, but you can use any small brush to really clean it.
customer_reviews.author: Moselle

customer_reviews.title: The tips are awesome! I can't recommend this set enough
customer_reviews.text: This was my first ever attempt at piping frosting (and my first homemade butter cream frosting). The tips are awesome! I can't recommend this set enough.
customer_reviews.author: Stacie

customer_reviews.title: Good tips, crappy storage box.
customer_reviews.text: Lid to case doesn’t latch well unless it’s in a certain spot. Hard to find that sweet spot
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Quality and Durable !
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this set! Enables us to create wonderful cakes and desserts!
customer_reviews.author: Gardening Granny

customer_reviews.title: Nice tip set with holder....
customer_reviews.text: This tip set will meet needs of most decorators unless you are really doing large, fancy cakes. Great for decorating cookies and cupcakes.
customer_reviews.author: TooTired2Shop

customer_reviews.title: Love all the tips
customer_reviews.text: Really like all the tips and the container. Easy to clean up and love all the options.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Great Tip Set
customer_reviews.text: love this tip set! doesnt include the 1M which i had to buy separately but it comes with more than enough tips to experiment with! a little tough to clean but thats just the way the tips are shaped, not really wilton’s fault. i kept the external box so i have the picture of the tips and its shape on hand
customer_reviews.author: Samuel

customer_reviews.title: Perfect set to start decorating at home
customer_reviews.text: Love all the tips and organizer. I'm just now starting to decorate cakes from home and this is perfect to get me started.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for piping practicing. Its easy to use since they label the number on the piping tips. Great storage box as well. Highly recommended if you love to decorate your cake! Ok quality. Will see if staining occurs for long term use.
customer_reviews.author: LenKen

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Comes in a small beat box. Not as big as I expected, but works great nonetheless.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and so many choices to decorate with
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loved this sets of decorating tips
customer_reviews.text: Loved this sets of decorating tips. In my opinion, the storage case is very durable and the decorating tips work perfectly. So far, they have no rust. They are very easy to clean, I clean mine by hand, using a small brush and some lukewarm water, then set them to dry thoroughly before placing them back into the storage case.
customer_reviews.author: AmazingG

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I love this set! There's TONS of tips and it even comes with a piping chart to show you what tips will produce. It's a great reference guide, definately worth the investment!
customer_reviews.author: Cassaundra Wingo

customer_reviews.title: Very nice decorating set
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift to our Granddaughter. She was so excited when she got it as she is learning how to decorate cakes. I have one that I paid a lot more than this for. The case is well made too. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: John H. Yard

customer_reviews.title: Love the variety
customer_reviews.text: Love the new tips. Not sure how to use one of the couplers yet. Make sure you have a small bottle brush for cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: RAMONA E POWELL

customer_reviews.title: Cool stuff
customer_reviews.text: Got this for the wife and she hasn't opened it yet but I can tell it's going to be awesome. Can't wait to see her creations. I'm certain she will love it. Seems like a lot of cool stuff for the price. I've gotten her a lot of Wilton products and she has yet to be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Russ Moore

customer_reviews.title: Love!!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use even got beginners, a bunch of different options and easy to clean/store!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany w.

customer_reviews.title: Nice set
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice set. You do need to get extra large couplers for the big tips.
customer_reviews.author: Maria A.

customer_reviews.title: So good!!
customer_reviews.text: Everything is so good and the box is small, doesn't take a lot of space, I'm happy
customer_reviews.author: Ayala

customer_reviews.title: Best price I have saw these anywhere for
customer_reviews.text: Best price I have saw these anywhere for. Will definitely buy these again as a gift to anyone. Needed these for my pasty class
customer_reviews.author: Katt Robins

customer_reviews.title: Great Variety!
customer_reviews.text: Love this set! It has so much variety but not at a super expensive price. I'm really enjoying learning how to use each of the types of designs and my baking creations look more professional!
customer_reviews.author: AMP78

customer_reviews.title: Missing tip, incomplete set
customer_reviews.text: Always loved Wilton products. My biggest issue is I purchased this set and I'm missing the #233 tip, which most days would be fine BUT I needed that tip specifically for a cake I'm making my daughter this weekend.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Sporer

customer_reviews.title: having alot of fun with these
customer_reviews.text: Goid selection, having alot of fun with these. Fast transaction/delivery, very satisfied. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Glick

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a present for my sister, who loves decorating cakes, and she was so excited!! The case it comes in is really great because there's room to add other tips, so if you buy more they won't be hard to find. The value is really great too, as Wilton products are pricier and don't always come in bulk.
customer_reviews.author: Serena Rose Bettis

customer_reviews.title: Good set
customer_reviews.text: This was a decent set at a fair price. Daughter will add to her holiday baking supplies
customer_reviews.author: Catherine J Matteson-Davis

customer_reviews.title: Awesome set
customer_reviews.text: Wilton makes the best tips and I love the case!
customer_reviews.author: Alex M.

customer_reviews.title: Cherished tool set!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect set! Has a lot of tips and large ones too w the pics of the designs they can each make
customer_reviews.author: michelle

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: The price I got for these weren't a bad price and the tips are amazing! You get many tips, only missing a few. They leave you a couple open spots in case you want to add more tips to the case. It is small and compact, which is good. Wilton never seems to disappoint!
customer_reviews.author: Marc 3

customer_reviews.title: Great tip set
customer_reviews.text: This tip set absolutely met my expectations and the case it came with definitely keeps them from rolling around my tote. I would recommend this to anyone who makes a lot of buttercream frosting
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Well priced and complete set of decorating tips!
customer_reviews.text: I am starting to bake and needed a good set of decorating tips. This one has everything I was looking for. Gave it 4 stars because the flower nail is too small. They need to include a large one as well.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen

customer_reviews.title: Wilton Master Decorating Tip Set, 55-Piece decorating tips, Cake Decorating Supplies
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used it yet but sure I will love it.
customer_reviews.author: HD Lorider

customer_reviews.title: Excellent assortment
customer_reviews.text: What a great assortment of pieces! These make decorating a breeze!
customer_reviews.author: hlduckie10

customer_reviews.title: Great set!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful set with a nice case. The guide on the box will be helpful to save for future reference.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice selection of tips both for beginners and experienced cake peeps
customer_reviews.text: I liked that this came with everything including flower nails, couplers and multiple tips for the main styles.
customer_reviews.author: D. Solomon

customer_reviews.title: Wilton makes great tips. This set was a gift and my ...
customer_reviews.text: Wilton makes great tips. This set was a gift and my daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.author: G Flores

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great set of piping tips and I love the carry case as well. Wish it came with a tip cleaner!
customer_reviews.author: JNEE

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the 55-Piece Master Decorating Tip Set for my wife as a gift. The kit contains more tips than she needs but all the tips she needs are included in the set. Good price and its Wilton quality.
customer_reviews.author: Bob G

customer_reviews.title: Almost 5 stars!!
customer_reviews.text: So happy!! The only thing that kept me from giving 5 stars was there wasn't a big coupler for the larger tips just 2 small ones. Other than that I love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love all the options that come with this
customer_reviews.text: Love all the options that come with this. Numerous tips of different sizes and styles. Easy storing in the container it comes with to ensure tips do not get damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn Cobleigh

customer_reviews.title: So in love with this set
customer_reviews.text: So in love with this set. Have only gotten to use a few so far but can't wait to find excuses to bake all sorts of goodies!
customer_reviews.author: PyrettaBlaze

customer_reviews.title: and have been really pleased with the variety of the tips included that I've ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to up my cake decorating game, and have been really pleased with the variety of the tips included that I've used on two cakes so far. My only gripe which brought this down to 3 stars was that the box itself is hard to close. Once everything is lined up, it still doesn't quite feel like it's clicking shut even though it is.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I am happy
customer_reviews.text: I happy with what I ordered, All the pieces are here ans the package came in perfect condition, I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Nia

customer_reviews.title: Lots of options
customer_reviews.text: New to cake decorating, love these tips, wish more fit in the case
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: Lots of tip options, just what we needed. I liked the examples printed on the lid of what each tip produces.
customer_reviews.author: Linda B.

customer_reviews.title: Looks like product was used
customer_reviews.text: Llooks like product was used. Some items seem to be missing. Box it came it looks like it been previously opened. Need to keep box as that where it shows what all the tips are for
customer_reviews.author: d

customer_reviews.title: Pristine Condition
customer_reviews.text: This Master Piping Set arrived in pristine condition...100% worth every penny, and even the price was unbeatable...I will definitely order from this seller again and again...
customer_reviews.author: V. Powell

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good set for beginner. Note that 1M tip is not present in this set. Other than that I really love this product!
customer_reviews.author: Ankita

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the tips are better than I expected! The case it came in is very very nice and easy for organizing. I definitely recommend. I can't wait to use them!
customer_reviews.author: Mae

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!!!
customer_reviews.text: I just started decorating cookies with them and they worked great!!!! I love the guide that shows what each tip looks like!!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Peaslee

customer_reviews.title: Great tips.
customer_reviews.text: These tips are wonderful. I wish the container was bigger though so I could add more tips to it.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa smith

customer_reviews.title: Fun starter set for cake decorating
customer_reviews.text: Great set with the case and lid. Only problem is putting the tips away neatly and getting the lid to latch shut
customer_reviews.author: Amy Olson

customer_reviews.title: Great set of tips for my wife
customer_reviews.text: Great set of tips for my wife. She's used these on several projects and they seem like they will stand the test of time well.
customer_reviews.author: Tom D.

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Good complete set. Arrived in good condition. Great for experimenting and getting creative, even for beginners
customer_reviews.author: Katheryn

customer_reviews.title: Lid won't stay on.
customer_reviews.text: Tips are great! Storage case is junk. I ordered this primarily to help keep all my tips organized. Clips that hold lid on do not hold.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene

customer_reviews.title: These are easy and fun to work with
customer_reviews.text: I am brand new to cake decorating! These are easy and fun to work with. Thank you Wilton for making cake decorating fun. The only problem is deciding which one to use first!
customer_reviews.author: Carla

customer_reviews.title: Great set!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, has a lot of tips for a variety of designs.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren 56

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: got it for my mother in law. she LOVES it.
customer_reviews.author: iRa

customer_reviews.title: Best Piping Nozzles Ever
customer_reviews.text: These are Really nice for beginners as well as professionals.
customer_reviews.author: Vaishnavi B.

product_meta.title: Wilton Master Decorating Tip Set, 55-Piece decorating tips, Cake Decorating Supplies
product_meta.description: Color:SilverThe ultimate cake decorating tip set for any cake decorator, all in a convenient plastic organizer case. Set includes: 55 decorating tips 55 decorating tips (Round 1, 2, 2A, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 10, 12; Star 4B, 14, 16, 18, 21, 27, 30, 32, 54, 199, 363; Leaf 66, 67, 68, 70, 74, 349, 352, 366; Ruffle 86, 100, 340, 353, 402; Petal 101, 102, 103, 104, 125, 150; Drop Flower 2D, 107, 109, 129, 131, 224; Specialty 2B, 44, 47, 81, 83, 105, 233), plus two standard couplers and two flower nails (1.25 in. each).
feature_bullets: Cake decorating tip set contains an assortment of round, star, petal and leaf tips as well as specialty tips
The Decorator Smart Tip Organizer allows you to grab any tip you need quickly
Both flower nails are 1.25 inches (3.2 centimeter)
Tips, flower nails and couplers are top rack dishwasher safe; wipe organizer case with soft, damp cloth

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
